summary: VEHICLE CONTINUES TO ACCELERATE WHILE BREAKING.  THIS INCIDENT HAS HAPPEND FIVE TIMES SINCE NEW CAR PURCHASE ON APRIL 29, 2003.  CAR TOWED TWICE.  IN LAST INCIDENT UPON APPROCHING TRAFFIC LIGHT, BUSY INTERSECTION, CAR UNEXPECTEDLY ACCELERATED AS I TRIED TO COME TO A STOP.  ROLLED UP OFF ROAD AND HIT SIGN TO AVOID DRIVER IN FRONT.  *NLM
